verses.roman:
'sādhya'-'sādhana'-tattva puchite nā jāni
kṛpā kari' saba tattva kaha ta' āpani"

synonyms: sādhya—of the goal of spiritual life; sādhana—of the process of obtaining that goal; tattva—truth; puchite—to inquire; nā jāni—I do not know; kṛpā kari'-by Your causeless mercy; saba tattva—all such truths; kaha ta' āpani—please personally explain to me.
translation: "Actually I do not know how to inquire about the goal of life and the process for obtaining it. Being merciful upon me, please explain all these truths."
